CustomField.formula: OR( INCLUDES(GC_Show_Role__c, 'GC Account Manager'), INCLUDES(GC_Show_Role__c, 'GC Creative Director'), INCLUDES(GC_Show_Role__c, 'GC Traffic Administrator'), INCLUDES(GC_Show_Role__c, 'GC Director of Account Management'), INCLUDES(GC_Show_Role__c, 'GC Sales Manager') )
CustomField.label: Is Allowed Requestor
